name: American International Group, Inc.
summary: American International Group, Inc. (AIG) is a leading global insurance organization offering a wide range of property casualty insurance and other financial services to businesses and individuals in more than 200 countries and jurisdictions. Founded in 1919, AIG is headquartered in New York City and is recognized for its technical underwriting expertise and strategic use of reinsurance, as well as its adoption of advanced technologies like AI to drive transformation in the insurance sector.
